subject: Order of Tests
msgSnippet: Hello, i have a question about JUnit: Is it possible to influence the order of the Tests? I have some test methods in a Testcase and would like to have them
messageBody:
Hello,
i have a question about JUnit:
Is it possible to influence the order of the Tests?
I have some test methods in a Testcase and would like to
have them executed in a specific order, for some tests
reley on the success of others.
Is there any way to do this?

Kind Regards,
Heinz van Pee

--
Alles ist relativ!
WEB: http://www.vanpeeheinz.de
